title: TFR Ep. 580: Eternals, The French Dispatch, 5 Best Wes Anderson Characters
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss ‘Eternals’, the latest film from the MCU, directed by your most recent Best Picture and Director winner, one Ms. Chloé Zhao.  Initially concerned it was going to be a gorgeous looking bore, with it also being the lowest rated MCU film on Rotten Tomatoes, can it actually be…good..?  Then Wes Anderson returns with his latest project filled with whimsy and quirk, ‘The French Dispatch’. Featuring his typical all star cast, does Anderson deliver another odd, enthralling film?  There’s the venerable rundown of the big releases in Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the show by sharing their 5 Favorite Wes Anderson characters.  Will your favorite make the cut?  Come on Dingman!   

00:00-18:15: Intro/Eternals

18:16-29:10: Physical Media Picks

29:11-39:39: The French Dispatch

39:40-48:38: 5 Favorite Wes Anderson Characters

48:39-51:19: Wrap Up 

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook
